short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds BT-QC Tools section to specified Basetao pages and provides 'Add to BT-QC' functionality

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BT-QC Tools is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your shopping experience on Basetao, a popular Chinese shopping agent platform. This extension seamlessly integrates with Basetao product pages, providing valuable quality control (QC) information directly within the shopping interface.
Key Features:

Instant QC Data: View quality control information for products you're interested in, right on the Basetao product page.
Historical Order Insights: Access data from up to 24 previous orders for the same item, including weights and images.
Visual Gallery: Browse through a user-friendly gallery of QC images from past orders.
Quick Navigation: Easily jump to detailed QC reports on the BT-QC website with a single click.
Compatibility: Works with Taobao, Weidian, and 1688 product pages on Basetao.

BT-QC Tools empowers shoppers to make more informed decisions by providing easy access to historical quality control data. Whether you're a seasoned Basetao user or new to the platform, this extension helps streamline your purchasing process and enhances your overall shopping experience.
Get BT-QC Tools today and shop with confidence!
